MANAGEMENT a situation in which something such as a company or an economy is organized or controlled badly: economic/financial mismanagement They are investigating significant financial mismanagement by former board members.mismanagement of sth He is being sued for alleged mismanagement of the assets of a private company.mismanagement in sth Foreign investors pulled money out of the country because of corruption and mismanagement in the banking system.
